name: Dodge Ball 2D Beta (Split screen Multiplayer) (Bad game)
name_original: Dodge Ball 2D Beta (Split screen Multiplayer) (Bad game)
description:
BTW I will release a full version in mobile and pc.

Controls Player 1 or Green

Up - W

Down - S

Shoot - E

Controls Player 2 or Orange

Up - Up arrow key

Down - Down arrow key

Shoot - number 0

You can't attack if the Enemy is the one that has the ball.

The Name of the game is Box Card 2 but its lame thats why I Put Dodge Ball.
